Name: Number of Ad Campaigns
Description: The number of Ad Campaigns associated with this campaign.

Name: Number of Workflows
Description: The number of workflows associated with this campaign.

Name: Number of Blog posts
Description: The number of Blog posts associated with this campaign.

Name: Number of Social Posts
Description: The number of Social Posts associated with this campaign.

Name: Number of CTAs (Legacy)
Description: The number of CTAs(Legacy) associated with this campaign.

Name: Number of External Website Pages
Description: The number of external website pages associated with this campaign.

Name: Number of Forms
Description: The number of Forms associated with this campaign.

Name: Number of Landing pages
Description: The number of Landing pages associated with this campaign.

Name: Number of Lists
Description: The number of Lists associated with this campaign.

Name: Number of Emails
Description: The number of emails associated with this campaign.

Name: Number of Marketing Events
Description: The number of Marketing Events associated with this campaign.

Name: Number of Website pages
Description: The number of website pages associated with this campaign.

Name: Number of CTAs
Description: The number of CTAs associated with this campaign.

Name: Business units
Description: See which business unit your campaign is in. A business unit is used to organize your brands in a shared HubSpot account

Name: Campaign audience
Description: The audience of the campaign

Name: Campaign budget total
Description: The sum of all campaign budget items

Name: Campaign status
Description: The status of the campaign

Name: Campaign color
Description: The hexadecimal color of the campaign

Name: Created on
Description: The date the campaign was created

Name: Created by
Description: The user who created the campaign

Name: Campaign end date
Description: The end date of the campaign

Name: Campaign goal
Description: The goal of the campaign

Name: Merged record IDs
Description: The list of record IDs that have been merged into this record. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

Name: Campaign name
Description: The name of the campaign

Name: Record Source Detail 1
Description: First level of detail on how this record was created

Name: Record Source Detail 2
Description: Second level of detail on how this record was created

Name: Record Source Detail 3
Description: Third level of detail on how this record was created

Name: Record Source
Description: How this record was created

Name: Campaign Id
Description: The unique ID to relate this asset to its origin object

Name: Campaign owner
Description: The user assigned to manage the overall campaign

Name: Campaign spend total
Description: The sum of all campaign spend items

Name: Campaign start date
Description: The start date of the campaign

Name: Updated by user ID
Description: The user that last updated this object. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

Name: Campaign UTM
Description: A campaign UTM allows website traffic to be tracked and attributed to a campaign

Name: Owner Assigned Date
Description: The most recent date an owner was assigned to this object. This is set automatically by HubSpot and can be used for segmentation and reporting.

Name: Owner
Description: The owner of the object.
